newsList.title: New Research on Renewable Energy
newsList.shortDescription: Scientists discover a new way to store solar energy.
newsList.longDescription: A breakthrough in solar energy storage could revolutionize the renewable energy industry.

newsList.title: Tech Startup Raises $50M
newsList.shortDescription: Innovative AI company secures funding for expansion.
newsList.longDescription: A promising startup focused on AI technology just secured major investment backing.
